title: Star Schema ‚≠ê

answer.content:
### Star Schema:

**Structure:**
- Central fact table
- Dimension tables around it
- Direct joins only

### Benefits:
- Simple queries
- Fast performance
- Easy to understand

explanation: **Star** is the most common DW design.

answer.content:
### Snowflake Schema:

**Definition:** Normalized star schema.

### Comparison:
| Aspect | Star | Snowflake |
|--------|------|----------|
| Dimensions | Denormalized | Normalized |
| Complexity | Simpler | More tables |
| Storage | More | Less |

title: Fact vs Dimension üìä
ques: What is the difference between **fact and dimension tables**?

answer.content:
### Comparison:

| Aspect | Fact | Dimension |
|--------|------|----------|
| Contains | Measures | Descriptions |
| Size | Many rows | Fewer rows |
| Example | Sales amount | Customer info |

### Surrogate Keys:

**Definition:** System-generated identifiers.

### Benefits:
| Benefit | Reason |
|---------|--------|
| Stable | Never changes |
| Simple | Integer, fast joins |
| History | Track changes |

### SCD Types:

| Type | Handling |
|------|----------|
| Type 1 | Overwrite |
| Type 2 | Add new row (history) |
| Type 3 | Add column |

### Data Vault:

**Components:**
| Table Type | Purpose |
|------------|--------|
| Hub | Business keys |
| Link | Relationships |
| Satellite | Descriptive data |

### Benefit: Flexible, auditable
